column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=It is time to take a bath .
#id=2
#text=I gather my clothes I am going to put on after my bath and take them to the bathroom with me .
#id=3
#text=I find my bath mat and lay it on the floor to keep the floor dry .
#id=4
#text=I gather my towel and washcloth from the closet .
#id=5
#text=I put the stopper in the drain .
#id=6
#text=I turn on my water and adjust the temperature to my liking .
#id=7
#text=Once I have the tub filled halfway I turn off the water .
#id=8
#text=I get undressed and put my clothes in the clothes hamper .
#id=9
#text=I step into the tub and take a seat .
#text=I get my washcloth and wet it to wash my face first .
#text=I then dip my washcloth in the water again and lather it up with soap and begin washing the rest of my body .
#text=After I am through washing I make sure that I have rinsed all of the soap off my body good .
#text=I unplug the drain and then stand up .
#text=I get my towel and dry off from head to toe .
#text=I then get my clothes and put them on .
#text=I gather the bath mat from the floor and hang it over the shower rod to dry .
#text=I then make sure the bathtub is rinsed out .
